title: Random spooky laugh in game.
body: Im not sure what it is and i have never heard it before but whilst in a recent game i heard a pretty throaty evil laugh, like a spooky AF chuckle. i have no idea what caused it but me and my friend were the only people who heard it, and i heard it slightly before him. Please post anything similar that you have heard of or experienced.

replies.body: I hear it too in most games before the minions spawn , most of the time it happened to me if i go to the river and laugh (not sure if its related or just luck), but just yesterday a supposed new champ teaser that got released on china account kinda explains it " https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=POzIylGkZqg " , it wouldn't be the first time rito adds an Easter egg for a champ in the rift before it releases it (bard Illuminati thingy XD ) so maybe that's it ...idk thou :D
